20110111150639.000|20110111150641.000|CC1|HAPPENED TO THEIR SON.          
20110111150641.000|20110111150643.000|CC1|THE FAMILY IS DESCRIBED BY SOME 
20110111150643.000|20110111150645.000|CC1|NEIGHBORS AS FIERCELY RECLUSIVE.
20110111150645.000|20110111150646.000|CC1|BESIEGED BY THE MEDIA, THE HOUSE
